title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Military Structure in Beqaa Valley: A Comprehensive Report on Recent Counter-Terrorism Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a military structure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah after terrorists were identified within it.

IDF observations identified terrorists entering a military structure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in Beqaa Valley. Following the identification, fighter jets were dispatched which attacked the structure, including the terrorists within it.

Throughout the day, IDF forces carried out artillery fire to eliminate threats in several areas in Southern Lebanon.

In recent hours, several launchings were identified in Zari’it and Metula areas. IDF forces attacked the launch sources.

Attached is a documentation of the structure’s attack: https://bit.ly/3IerSvG
